'''Tom Sherry''' is a Scottish artist.

Sherry joined [[The Tolkien Society]] at the age of thirteen, following the [[BBC]] [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|radio production of ''The Lord of the Rings'']]. He was a regular contributor to many different publications submitting scores of black and white ink illustrations. His art has been published in ''[[The York Shire Post]]'', ''[[Tasarion (journal)|Tasarion]]'', ''[[Aglared (journal)|Aglared]], and [[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'' - for which he did numerous cover drawings.
